div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 13:53 pm CDT

div.div: Partly sunny, with a high near 64. Northeast wind around 10 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 39. North northeast wind 5 to 9 mph becoming calm after midnight.

A slight chance of rain after 8am. Partly sunny, with a high near 67. Light and variable wind becoming west 5 to 10 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

div.p:
Maps are attached for each meal pickup location, starting Monday, March 23 . These are also being shared via Social Media for your reference.
If you plan to have your children eat and have not completed the survey , please do so ASAP so our Opaa! Staff can plan accordingly. Reminder, please only complete the survey one time.
Survey link: https://docs.google.com/ forms/d/e/ . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Meal Pickup Maps
